amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to operate or maintain existing advanced imaging technology machines as mandatory or primary screening devices.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to operate or maintain existing advanced imaging technology machines as mandatory or primary screening devices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amash amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 300 (Roll no. 400).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
